name: Echo (itch) (miguelfmd)
description:
This game was made for a Game Jam.

The theme was mythology, so we decided to do a game about a reinterpretation of Echo´s myth. You are Echo and you have lost your voice, so you have to collect four musical notes around the forest to recover it. The forest is created differently  every time you play the game so you can replay it as many times as you want!

All the game was made by the team, no assets were taken.

------------------------UPDATE -----------------------------

We have heard your opinions. Here are some changes:

- The first wave is so much easier to find

- The player movement is completly fixed

-Horizontal keys added to the movement (right and left)
